Name: Inferno 2
About the game: The sequel to Inferno+, Radiangames' critically-acclaimed twin-stick action-RPG, arrives on PC at last! INFERNO 2 boasts even more devious levels, more weapons, more upgrades and powers, more enemies, and more customization, along with more insane explosions and particle effects. BIGGER, BETTER, BADDER! Inferno 2 on PC is everything Radiangames fans have been waiting for: * Play through 80+ levels of atmospheric awesomeness * New Game+ mode adds even more replayability * Customizable gamepad and KB/mouse controls * 3 difficulty levels (change it up at any time) * Dozens of enemy types * All-new special level types and goals * Tons of secrets to discover * A large arsenal of upgrade-able weapons and ship powers * Beautiful HD graphics * Steam Achievements
Meta Title: Inferno 2: Jul 29, 2015, Radiangames and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Inferno 2? Check out the release date (Jul 29, 2015), developer insights from Radiangames, and a complete game summary.
